title: Chickpea and rice balls
ingredients: ['100 g (3½ oz) long-grain white rice', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 fresh red chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '2 tomatoes, skinned, seeded and very finely chopped', '1 can chickpeas, about 410 g, drained and rinsed', '1 egg yolk', '3 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', '½ tsp paprika', 'salt and pepper']
